exits.description: north of here is dangerous, between the treacherous terrain of the foothills and the beasts that call them home.
foothills lie to the south
the younger part of the forest, often good for foraging, lies to the west

description: the watering hole here is the most reliable source of water for your small group of companions. it is a calm day here.
investigationDescription: fewer beasts come here now than when you first came to this land. you see few tracks in the wet earth.

exits.description: north of here is dangerous, between the treacherous terrain of the foothills and the beasts that call them home.
foothills lie to the south
the younger part of the forest, often good for foraging, lies to the west

description: the watering hole here is the most reliable source of water for your small group of companions. it is a calm day here.
investigationDescription: fewer beasts come here now than when you first came to this land. you see few tracks in the wet earth, but you can distinguish the tracks of your prey. it is close now.

description: the watering hole here is the most reliable source of water for your small group of companions. it is a calm day here.
investigationDescription: the tracks left in the mud here now only serve to remind you of your failure.

exits.description: north of here is dangerous, between the treacherous terrain of the foothills and the beasts that call them home.
foothills lie to the south
the younger part of the forest, often good for foraging, lies to the west

description: the watering hole here is the most reliable source of water for your small group of companions, but the predators of the night know this is an appealing spot for their prey. best not to linger.
investigationDescription: the sound of insects and frogs reverberate through the night. they do not share your fear of being found, being killed for another beast's meal.

foothills lie to the south

description: your senses were correct to lead you here. the bear is hunched over, drinking from the pool of water. it notices you as you approach and bares its teeth at you. Ohm and you stop. they say 'same as yesterday,' and begin circling around the bear.
investigationDescription: you can see the blood-matted fur from where you injured it yesterday, but it must have dislodged your spear somehow. it may be weak enough for an easy kill.

description: the bear is hunched over, drinking from the pool of water. it notices you as you approach and bares its teeth at you. Ohm and you stop. they nod and begin circling around the bear.
investigationDescription: you can see the blood-matted fur from where you injured it yesterday, but it must have dislodged your spear somehow. it may be weak enough for an easy kill.

exits.description: north of here is dangerous, between the treacherous terrain of the foothills and the beasts that call them home.
foothills lie to the south
the younger part of the forest, often good for foraging, lies to the west

investigationDescription: the blood of the slain bear soaks the dirt. it tells the tale of your struggle and triumph.

description: the site of your triumph is calm now in the darkness.
investigationDescription: the blood of the slain bear soaks the dirt. it tells the tale of your struggle and triumph.

foothills lie to the south
the younger part of the forest, often good for foraging, lies to the west

description: the watering hole is a dangerous place to be at night. vicious beasts could be in any hidden place to wait for prey.
investigationDescription: you do not have time to look around, Tei may be injured.

description: the ground around the watering hole is soft, making tracks show clearly. you do not see the footprints of the others.
investigationDescription: there are no signs that Nua and Onah were here.
